concept.title: Understanding the Student Homepage
concept.shortdesc: You can use your NC State Unity account to access your personal, academic and financial information, and it's very important that you keep this information safe. Use the resources and information below to protect your privacy.

conbody.p: To view or change your personal information in MyPack Portal:
On the personal informationtile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information, including

ul.li: Veterans InformationMilitary Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests
OIS Compliance Verificationfor International students only
